casebody.data:
2002-1385 (La. 10/25/02)

Paul BURGUIERES, et al. v. Dr. O’Neill POLLINGUE, et al. No. 2002-CC-1385. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 25, 2002.

In re Burguieres, William Jr.; Burguieres, Dian; Burguieres, Paul et al.;— Plaintiff(s); Applying for Writ of Certiora-ri and/or Review, Parish of Orleans, Civil District Court Div. J, No. 001-12972; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, No. 2002-C-0232.

Granted.
